summary: This mod adds a standalone follower to your game based on one of my own Skyrim character.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5501/9616765836_4b74d6d38e.jpg[/img]

Ariel is a standalone follower based on my Sexy Wednesday charatcer. She is completely standalone. She is a mage.(mostly sparks or lightning related spells)
[youtube]sLZ_xHuFDs0[/youtube]

She is in Bannered Mare

[img]http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5344/9613560519_d29903a411.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3668/9613521811_be87c61c4c.jpg[/img]


Credits

First of all a huge thanks to [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/705688/?]Seren4xx[/URL] and [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2015975/?]Yyna[/URL] for their invaluable help with my previous follower mod. The lessons i learned from them helped me avoid the mistakes of last time.

Now for the mods i used ...


[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/URL] 

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes Of Beauty by  LogRaam[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24600//?]Scarface by Gizmodian and Xenius[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes Of Beauty by  LogRaam[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D28946]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/URL]

I have also used some parts of the amazing works by ...

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2209393/?]hellosanta[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379/?]TairenSoul[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4559665/?]flyingpikachu[/URL]

Tutorial used 

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33106/?]Standalone Followers Tutorial by zzjay[/URL]


And a speacial thanks to the testers(in random order)...

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2015975/?]Yyna[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6553681/?]Caelrya[/URL]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6553678/?]knusperburger[/URL]

And a speacial shoutout to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6553681/?]Caelrya[/URL] for her support for her :D

If you like her PLEASE post pictures :)
author: innova889
